attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
E-Petitions are merely a way to get more details from us to sell on.

This site is a farce designed to get the postcodes of users so that they can be sent marketing material that they don't want.

rejection.details: No details from any petitioner or anyone who signs a petition are sold or given to any third parties or are used for anything other than responses related to those petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
